sense.def:
To testify
pomeni dati uradno izjavo na sodišču.

seg.quote: None of the victims would appear in court to testify against him.
Witnesses testify to his attempts at rape.
One man testified that he had seen me with Jonathan.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
testifies to an idea
, kaže, da je neka zamisel verjetno resnična.

seg.quote: All kinds of human experience testify to the close link between love and fear.
